summary: Adds 25 New lore friendly conjuration Spells to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Adds 25 New lore friendly conjuration Spells to Skyrim. All Summoned Creatures now lvl up with you. "lvl cap = 500"
All spells can be bought from [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Phinis_Gestor]Phinis Gestor[/url] in the College of Winterhold.

- Conjure Skeleton
- Conjure Bear
- Conjure Spriggan
- Conjure Ice Wraith
- Conjure Shade
- Conjure Wisp Shade
- Conjure Lurker
- Conjure Draugr
- Conjure Mountain Lion
- Conjure Scamp
- Conjure Gargoyle
- Conjure Death Hound
- Conjure Hunger
- Conjure Troll

- Conjure Daedroth
- Conjure Dremora Priest
- Conjure Dragon Priest

- Conjure Spectral Assassin
- Conjure Spectral Cultist
- Conjure Spectral Vampire

- Conjure Werewolf
- Conjure Werebear
- Conjure Wereboar
- Conjure Wereshark
- Conjure Vampire Lord
author: Aindra00
